column4: i download ubuntu-10.04.1-alternate-amd64.iso  is this the one for netbook?
AFAIK you can install any of the images and then get the netbook interface using APT.  So while I'm not sure it is or isn't, you can still use it.
Did you follow the Netbook Remix downloading instructions on ubuntu.com?
Heh, that's true.  Most are Atoms, right?
